Body:
data = pd.DataFrame([[4.0, 2.0, 0.6, -12], [4.2, 2.1, 0.59, -13.2], [3.9, 
    2.0, 0.58, -11.3], [4.3, 2.1, 0.62, -11.7], [4.1, 2.2, 0.63, -10.1]])
mean = expected_returns.mean_historical_return(data, frequency=1)
test_answer = pd.Series([0.00865598, 0.025, 0.01286968, -0.03632333])
pd.testing.assert_series_equal(mean, test_answer)
mean = expected_returns.mean_historical_return(data, compounding=True,
    frequency=1)
pd.testing.assert_series_equal(mean, test_answer)
